sentences.sContent: You want to retail or wholesale?
When we buy goods from overseas, we generate some jobs in retail and wholesale.
sentences.sContent_eng: When we buy goods from overseas, we generate some jobs in retail and wholesale.
sentences.sCn: 当我们从海外购买物资，这在零售和批发制造了一些工作机会。

sentences.sContent: At a wholesale vegetable market in Beijing, one manager says his costs have soared, as the products need to be transported in cool containers during the hot summer weather.
sentences.sContent_eng: At a wholesale vegetable market in Beijing, one manager says his costs have soared, as the products need to be transported in cool containers during the hot summer weather.
sentences.sCn: 北京一个蔬菜批发市场，一名经理说他的成本已经猛增，因为夏天天气太热，这些产品都要装在冷却箱里进行运输。

phrases.pCn: 对同业及大客户的大金额银行业务

remMethod.val: whole(全部) + sale(卖) → 整个地卖 → 批发

trans.tranOther: the business of selling goods in large quantities at low prices to other businesses, rather than to the general public
